statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id='123';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_name, service_usage_data FROM customer_data ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 'CUST001';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 'CUST002';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, service_usage_data FROM customer_data WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM service_usage_data GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM service_usage_data WHERE service_type = 'Service A'
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_usage FROM service_usage_data GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM service_usage_data ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_profiles
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, price FROM services ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT customer_name, service_name, usage_date FROM customers, services, customer_service_usage WHERE customers.customer_id = customer_service_usage.customer_id AND services.service_id = customer_service_usage.service_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, price FROM services ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_service_usage WHERE usage_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, s.service_name, cs.usage_date FROM customers c JOIN customer_service_usage cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id JOIN services s ON s.service_id = cs.service_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(service_id) AS service_count FROM customer_service_usage GROUP BY customer_id HAVING service_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, service_price FROM services ORDER BY service_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, service_name, usage_date FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_usage ON customers.customer_id = customer_usage.customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM services ORDER BY service_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, service_name, usage_date FROM customers JOIN customer_usage ON customers.customer_id = customer_usage.customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ServiceUsageData ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(usage_count) AS total_usage FROM ServiceUsageData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_description FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
